name: MarsHex - grow your colony on Mars
name_original: MarsHex - grow your colony on Mars
description:
MarsHex is a peaceful puzzle strategy game in which you create a beautiful Mars landscape by placing tiles on the board. Explore a variety of colorful biomes, unlock new tiles and complete quests to grow your colony on Mars! Play classic mode, complete quests, get points, after completing a funny quest, get additional tiles. Enjoy creativity in creative mode! demo mode enabled

MarsHex is currently being developed solo game developer. To get the latest updates be sure to follow me on Insagram.  Thanks for checking out our game and we can't wait to share all the exciting updates we have planned for it!
